name: Linearis
description:
What is Linearis? It’s a game designed to make you think. A game designed to challenge you, and to entertain you in a brand new fashion. Linearis is a unique take on the classic Match 3 game, with some innovative twists to push your wits to the limit.
Match 3 or more orbs together by linking them horizontally, vertically, or both. Orbs can be right next to each other, or across the screen. I’m sure it sounds like a cakewalk, I’m sure. But I assure you, you’ll be in for a hefty surprise. This game will throw some serious obstacles your way, designed to punish you, but with the right amount of brainpower, I’m sure you’ll prevail.
Perhaps. :)
